description:
A text-based pure exploration simulator. There are no collectables, objectives or puzzles. Recommended Spotify playlist

--------------------------------------------------------

YOUR CREDENTIALS AS A << XENOTHEOLOGIST >> ARE REQUIRED BY << THE DEEP SPACE STUDY AUTHORITY >> 

DETAILS FOLLOW 

--------------------------------------------------------

ORIGINAL REQUEST

Our study site on U-9 has unearthed a building of probable religious significance. 

We've now excavated a large amount of the building and documented various surfaces and objects inside it - there should be enough for a subject matter expert to work with.

--------------------------------------------------------

TECHNICAL INSTRUCTIONS

The terminal input is mode based and defaults to MOVE

To switch mode type 'm' followed by a letter

  • m - move
  • l (lowercase L) - look
  • c - codex 
mm = switches to move ml = switches to look mc = switches to codex

Move

Type w, a, s or d and press enter when in move mode to move north, west, south or east respectively

Look 

Type w, a, s or d and press enter when in look mode to inspect the item(s) one square to the north, west, south or east respectively

Codex

Enter a codex entry number to view it

Numbers beginning with C are codex entries

e.g. C007

Commands can be chained

Commands can be chained to do multiple things in one enter keypress

mmdddd = switch to move and move east four times mc007 = switch to codex mode and view entry 007
